ExecutiveSummary.one_line: Consensus roadmap aligning service reliability, costs, and ridership recovery.

bullets.item: Staggered headway restoration by corridor priority and demand.
Maintenance windows batched to clear backlog with minimal disruption.
Fare pilots targeting equity without eroding fiscal stability.

SynthesizedConclusion.KeyFinding: Restore 6â€“8 min peak headways on top 3 corridors.
Expand off-peak coverage to underserved zones with microtransit feeders.
SynthesizedConclusion.RiskAssessment: Capex-light fleet refresh; fare pilot impacts monitored quarterly.
